name: Spooky Picture Game Deluxe
description:
Welcome to Spooky Picture Game ~Deluxe~ A unique 2.5D hold-and-release picture shooting game that's definitely not inspired by Fatal Frame. How long can you survive in this ghost-filled hallway!?

Hold to focus / Release to shoot

Have fun and a happy spooky halloween~

Creators

Sam Feng - Programming, Music - @samfenggames

Ryoma Marta-Sugawara - Sound, Art - https://ryoma.ms/

Jose Salas - Art - @salas_games

ARX · Egyptian Camera
